articles.author: Tami Luhby
articles.title: Ozempic, Mounjaro and hundreds of other drugs become even more expensive in 2024 - CNN
articles.description: Some Americans may have to shell out more this year for Ozempic and Mounjaro, two wildly popular diabetes medications also used for weight loss.
articles.content:
Some Americans may have to shell out more this year for Ozempic and Mounjaro, two wildly popular diabetes medications also used for weight loss.
